text: Takheun jak keunoe hai ahli kitab Meusapeue pakat saboh kalimah Kamoe ngon gata beu saban that-that Taseumah meuhat sidroe Potallah Bek na peue laen tapeucharikat Tuhan Hadharat cit sidroe Allah Bek roh tacok droe ladom keu Tuhan Tapeugah Tuhan nyang bukon Allah Meunyo jipaleng han jitem pateh Gata pih ka gleh hana le salah Takheun boh jinoe beu na tamaâ€˜lum Kamoe Iseulam jok droe bak Allah
